name: Darkling Plain: an Augmented Reality Miniatures Board Game
blurb: This fantasy board game comes alive when your pieces transform into 3D heroes and beasts battling on a magical, living landscape.

rewards.reward: No Reward
TIP JAR \u2014 Thanks for your support! You\u2019ll receive Backer updates and hopefully we\u2019ll convince you to get more involved.

AUGMENTED ADVISOR \u2014 Some inexpensive and very entertaining fun for you! You\u2019ll receive the AR Reader app download + a PDF download of the card that creates a Jotnar warrior in 3D + unique Jotnar cheer animation to celebrate your support of our project. The cheer will be animated via motion capture by the individual who pledges at the Jotnar Cheerleader level, if there is a backer who pledges at that level.\r\n\r\nThe Jotnar are a Viking-like people who  are the human characters in Darkling Plain. Please see the Glossary to the left.

ELEMENTAL ARMY \u2014 You receive the AR Reader app download + Jotnar card via PDF + Jotnar cheer + the cards to complete the essentials of an Elemental army: the Ragur and Manticore cards via PDF. The Ragur is a Werevym (mix of man and animal, in this case a cat) and the manticore is the Jorundimar created with Ragur + Earth.

DARKNESS ARMY \u2014 You receive the AR Reader app download + Jotnar card via PDF + Jotnar cheer + the cards to complete the essentials of a Dark army: Draum and Void Dragon cards via PDF. The Draum is a Werevym (mix of man and animal, in this case a serpent) and the Void Dragon is the Jorundimar created with Draum + Death.

ODE TO WHITE WOLF \u2014 In addition to the AR Reader app download + Jotnar card via PDF + Jotnar cheer + Draum, Void Dragon, Ragur and Manticore cards via PDF, you will receive a card for the Vargal, a Werevym who looks like a wolfman. Also included is an exclusive color customization so your Vargal can be white-furred. By being the first to selecte this pledge reward, you\u2019ll also unlock the Vargal character for lots of other people!

AUGMENTED ADVOCATE \u2014 Now you\u2019re starting to gather an army! You receive the AR Reader app download + 12 character cards via PDF download so you can have many great warriors and beasts arrayed wherever you\u2019d like. The included cards will allow you to create these animated models: Jotnar archer, Jotnar swordsman, Jotnar spearman, Ragur, Draum, Manticore, Void Dragon, Ragur Shaman, Draum Shaman, Kalder archer, Kalder swordsman, Kalder spearman. The Kalder is a Jotnar warrior champion. Plus, the Jotnar cheer to celebrate your support!

DARK LORD \u2014 At this level you receive the complete game app (includes AR reader) + the full-color game board + 12 character cards representing the Dark army (those listed in Augmented Advocate except the manticore but adding a Braka shaman) + Jotnar cheer animation. This reward tier will also include all the Dark Jorundimar unlocked via stretch goals. (This does not include the exclusive Basilisk and Phoenix characters.)

NATURE GOD \u2014 At this level you receive the complete game app (includes AR reader) + the full-color game board + 12 character cards representing the Elemental army (those listed in Augmented Advocate except the void dragon but adding a Braka shaman) + Jotnar cheer animation. This reward tier will also include all the Elemental Jorundimar unlocked via stretch goals. (This does not include the exclusive Basilisk and Phoenix characters.)

AUGMENTED APOSTLE \u2014 The complete set-up! At this level you receive the complete game app (includes AR reader) + the full-color game board + 12 character cards (those listed in Augmented Advocate) + Jotnar cheer. This reward tier will also include all the characters (both Dark and Elemental!) unlocked via stretch goals. (This does not include the exclusive Basilisk and Phoenix characters.)

CAT LORD \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Ragur character. The Ragur is a Werevym that resembles a cat-man. He can have fur of many colors and lengths, a lion\u2019s mane, large ears, a bushy tail, enormous claws, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

DEEP LIEGE \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Hahnt character. The Hahnt is a Werevym that resembles a mix of man and creatures of the water. He can have gills, multi-colored scales, webbed feet, crab clawed hands, tentacles, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

MONKEY KING \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Geig character. The Geig is a Werevym that resembles an ape-man. He can have no tail, a long prehensile tail, thick gorilla features, spidery monkey features, many colors of fur, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

RAVEN GOD \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Skaren character. The Skaren is a Werevym that resembles a bird-man. He can have dark feathers, colored feathers, wings or arms with hands, a sharp beak, a bludgeoning beak, clawed or webbed feet, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

SERPENT MASTER \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Draum character. The Draum is a Werevym that resembles a serpent-man. He can have multi-colored scales, patterned scales, wicked tongues, a rattler tail, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

WOLF PRINCE \u2014 As Augmented Apostle + all appearance customization options ever offered for the Vargal character. (Yes, this includes the white fur that\u2019s part of the \u2018Ode to White Wolf\u2019 pledge level.) The Vargal is a Werevym that resembles a wolf-man. He can have slender or bulky features, a short or long tail, human or dog legs, many colors of fur, mangy fur, and more. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

$200 = ORTA MASTER \u2014 You are an Augmented Apostle, but you also receive all the appearance customizations ever offered for the Werevym of all six of the Orta (animal totems): Draum (serpent), Geig (primate), Hahnt (fish), Ragur (cat), Skaren (bird) and Vargal (wolf). This will give you an amazing array of colors and textures with which to personalize any of the Werevym. Note that these customizations sometimes affect the character's attributes and powers!

$250 DEADLY DARKNESS \u2014 You are an Augmented Apostle but with one incredibly special bonus: an exclusive character for your Dark army. You will be among the very few to ever receive the deadly Basilisk, the Dark Jorundimar created with Draum + Death. This character is exclusive to our Kickstarter project. This character has additional animations and particle effects, so it will be stunning to behold on your table or desktop. Plus, like all Jorundimar, it possesses extraordinary powers that can turn the tide of a battle.

EXPLOSIVE ELEMENTS  \u2014 You are an Augmented Apostle but with one incredibly special bonus: an exclusive character for your Elemental army. You will be among the very few to ever receive Phoenix, the Elemental Jorundimar created with Skaren + Fire.  This character is exclusive to our Kickstarter project. This character has additional animations and particle effects, so it will be stunning to behold on your table or desktop. Plus, like all Jorundimar, it possesses extraordinary powers that can turn the tide of a battle.

AUGMENTED ANIMATOR \u2014 You are an Augmented Apostle + you will receive a special invitation to the Nocturnal Media office for a special 2-hour motion-capture session. Unleash your inner Andy Serkis! You will work with our team to create a number of animations that will be unique to your character because you will be the performer. Have a rude taunt with which to castigate your enemies? Want to display your own mad skillz in a frenzied attack? Gyrate maniacally while magic whirls around you? Come to Texas and let loose your beast. (Travel and accommodations are your responsibility.)

JOTNAR CHEERLEADER \u2014 As Augmented Animator, but you will also have the privilege of acting out the Jotnar cheer animation received by everyone who pledges at least $5 to our project. So we\u2019ll add an additional half hour for your stay at our office. We might also give you something extra to make you especially cheerful.

AUGMENTED ARCHITECT \u2014 As Augmented Apostle, but achieving the highest level of support and appreciation! We will work with you to create a unique Jorundimar of your choice! These are the titans of the battlefield with all the coolest special attacks and animations. Your unique character will be fully modeled to the quality and specifications of other characters in the game, and you will also create the animations of the character as detailed in Augmented Animator. You will communicate directly with game designer Stewart Wieck to create your character, which must have something of a mythological basis and be the result of a logical combination of forces assigned to either the darkness or elemental armies of Darkling Plain. For example, Vargal + Destruction could be the viscious Dark Jorundimar known as Fenris. (Travel and accommodations are your responsibility.)

AUGMENTED ASCENSION \u2014 As Augmented Apostle, but ascending to the highest level of support and appreciation! We will fashion a character model of you in the likeness of a Jotnar. You will have the attributes of a Kalder (a Jotnar champion who can transform into a Jorundimar) and as a Kalder you may outfit yourself with any of the three basic weapons (bow, spear and sword) plus one additional unique weapon of your choosing that we will model just for your Kalder (subject to approval). Your unique character will be fully modeled to the quality and specifications of other characters in the game, and you will also create the animations of the character as detailed in Augmented Animator. Destroying an opponent with an animated character model of yourself is surely the ultimate way to augment reality!
